name: DeOO linux
short_description: DeOO linux is a small, portable and modularized Linux operation system.  It is built with modern apps, such as kernel 2.6.31, Xorg 7.4.  It provides lightweight pekwm desktop and KDE desktop. It can be installed to file system such as fat and nfts.
